relatedBlades.title: Network-layer DDoS Attack Trends for Q2'20
relatedBlades.copy:
### __Learn about trending attack vectors— and how you can protect your on-premise, hybrid, and cloud-based networks__

DDoS attacks on the network are on the rise. The number of Layer 3 and Layer 4 DDoS attacks __observed over Cloudflare's network of over 25 million Internet properties__ doubled in Q2'20 compared to the previous quarter. Bad actors also used a wider variety of attack vectors.

__Read this report to learn:__
- which attack vectors were the most prevalent
- how attacks were geographically distributed around the world
- steps you can take to protect your networks
Learn what industry analysts have to say about Cloudflare DDoS protection.
